Reviews.Title: “Bigger rooms, quiet, good value: could use some touch-up”
Reviews.Author: professorroyhinkley
Reviews.Content: stay hotel value especially marriott reward 7500 free bigger typical hotel kitchen nice fridge wasnt suite kitchen larger nice bed comfy softer bed unlike review found quiet lot kids weekend didnt hear breakfast minimal breakfast nice didnt expect nearby starbucks interstate exit north 86th st looking wireless internet tough little interstate sign weird location negative freshening maybe remodel level bad cleaning painting look overall stay relatively cheap quiet
